name: Hanzi Character Featurizer
shortDescription: In deep learning, the characteristics of Chinese characters (pronunciation characteristics, font characteristics) need to be extracted in many cases. This project provides a general character feature extraction framework, and built-in pinyin, glyph (four-corner code) and radical disassembly features.
longDescription: In deep learning, the characteristics of Chinese characters (pronunciation characteristics, font characteristics) need to be extracted in many cases. This project provides a general character feature extraction framework, and built-in pinyin, glyph (four-corner code) and radical disassembly features.
